properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 29 at 8:59AM PST until January 31 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, seas 9 to 12 feet
at 14 seconds. For the second Small Craft Advisory, northwest
winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 10 to 13
feet at 19 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM Thursday to
3 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 3 AM PST FRIDAY
